summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating the paragraph text under the landing question in frontend/src/App.tsx to the exact provided message (including the ❤️). However, two additional files were modified that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.reason:
BuildRequest only asked to change the paragraph text in the selected

element; it did not request changes to repository summary/metadata files.
BuildRequest did not request changing project_state.json; only the paragraph text in App.tsx was requested.
